Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Neurologic Manifestations/Neurobehavioral Manifestations/Consciousness Disorders/Unconsciousness/Coma/Insulin Coma
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Glucose Metabolism Disorders/Hypoglycemia/Insulin Coma
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Nervous System Finding/Coma/Insulin Coma
Record.Description: Severe HYPOGLYCEMIA induced by a large dose of exogenous INSULIN resulting in a COMA or profound state of unconsciousness from which the individual cannot be aroused.Sudden significant drop in BLOOD GLUCOSE or hypoglycemic shock which affects the hemodynamic equilibrium of all vital organs.
